Policies¶

class terrasnek.policies.TFCPolicies(base_url, org_name, headers, verify)¶

Policies are configured on a per-organization level and are organized and grouped into policy sets, which define the workspaces on which policies are enforced during runs. In these workspaces, the plan’s changes are validated against the relevant policies after the plan step.

https://www.terraform.io/docs/cloud/api/policies.html

create(payload)¶

This creates a new policy object for the organization, but does not upload the actual policy code

POST /organizations/:org_name/policies

destroy(policy_id)¶

DELETE /policies/:policy_id

list(page=None, page_size=None, search=None)¶

GET /organizations/:org_name/policies

PARAMS:

https://www.terraform.io/docs/cloud/api/policies.html#query-parameters

show(policy_id)¶

GET /policies/:policy_id

update(policy_id, payload)¶

PATCH /policies/:policy_id

upload(policy_id, payload)¶

PUT /policies/:policy_id/upload
